snippet: St. Louis County police apologized Monday for the wording of a flier announcing a seminar to help officers interact with the media....

headline.print_headline: St. Louis County Cops Apologize for Flier Wording
headline.main: St. Louis County Cops Apologize for Flier Wording

lead_paragraph: St. Louis County police apologized Monday for the wording of a flier announcing a seminar to help officers interact with the media.
